column3: Concept ACK. I was making a similar refactoring here when adding the `estimatefeerate` rpc.
> I was making a similar refactoring here when adding the `estimatefeerate` rpc.\n\nMe too: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/166 :)
nit, `assert(stats)` seems to be checking for more than missing cases (like `assert(false)`), maybe update the comment
I think the comment and `assert(stats);` are independent here, as `std::unique_ptr::get` could return `nullptr`.
